description: Variation of ref: 21/03694/FUL condition number 1 to be amended as follows: This permission shall be for a limited period of 3 years only, expiring on 31/01/2028. Following this date, the building and any enabling development (excluding the car parking and training pitch) shall be removed from the site and the land shall be reinstated to an open landscape and thereafter be retained as such.
